body:
I've been demoted at 10:58 am on Thursday the 22nd of October, 2015 for reasons confidential to the senior staff team.

I'll still be active on all platforms and scrim with Apollo, just won't be in the staff team anymore.

I really am sorry about how I acted yesterday, I hope you understand why I was so mad... you know who you are.

Thanks,
Aura

-Demoted Senior Moderator.
body_tagged:

title: It's the end for me.

replies.body: Bye Aura. Thanks for talking me out of retiring all those times.
replies.body_tagged: Bye Aura. Thanks for talking me out of retiring all those times.

replies.body: I know how a demotion feels first hand, mine doesn't seem as serious as yours but the experience is the same. I am happy your not leaving because you aren't staff anymore because I have seen others follow that path. If you ever need me for anything I am here but by the sounds of things you seem alright on your own...
replies.body_tagged: I know how a demotion feels first hand, mine doesn't seem as serious as yours but the experience is the same. I am happy your not leaving because you aren't staff anymore because I have seen others follow that path. If you ever need me for anything I am here but by the sounds of things you seem alright on your own...

replies.body:
Thanks for being a great senior mod and thankfully you're staying to play for Apollo (:

Unfortunately a mistake was made here...
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: ty, u were a really god senior staff and they made a mistake about demoting u.
replies.body_tagged: ty, u were a really god senior staff and they made a mistake about demoting u.

replies.body: Wow, it must be hard feeling going through a demotion. The fact that I have never gone through a demotion I can't really feel the pain, but I got a straight idea of it.
replies.body_tagged: Wow, it must be hard feeling going through a demotion. The fact that I have never gone through a demotion I can't really feel the pain, but I got a straight idea of it.

Sad to see you go tho! :<

replies.body: Goodbye to your place in the staff team

replies.body:
Well, this is my opinion. I don't see why this should be a sad day. For me the staff in this server (which I love a lot) is useless, I mean, that yes you try to do somethings, but I don't see any change.
So Aura if you did something bad, accept the consequence, and don't post that, because I think you are trying to feel sad, to get support of the  people. Note: this is only my opinion, any negative answer will imply consequences.
